abstract: Carl Icahn increases his tender offer for Lions Gate Entertainment to $7.50 a share from $6.50.
snippet: Carl Icahn increases his tender offer for Lions Gate Entertainment to $7.50 a share from $6.50.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn has increased his tender offer for shares of the independent film studio Lions Gate Entertainment to $7.50 from $6.50 a share.

headline.main: Icahn Raises Offer for Lions Gate
